item.title: Rat running round, 31st August
item.description:
Hi, rat running along the pavement at street level at this location, daytime today (11am 32/08/2025).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fisherman's Hall Wharf, City of London

item.title: Best Turkish Kebab Takeaway litter all over Walford Road AGAIN, 31st August
item.description:
Once again Walford Road is littered in Best Turkish Kebab takeaway boxes & uneaten food. People sit in their cars, eat their takeaway and throw it onto the pavements outside our houses. It is disgusting and unhygienic
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flags littering street furinture, 31st August
item.description:
Hi! An unsightly set of flags have been added to the lamp posts and other street furniture following the far-right movement 'Operation Raise the Colours'. They are cheap, very tacky and attached with cable ties/tape on lamp posts and other street furniture.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merewood Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped disused garage, 31st August
item.description:

item.title: Red Cross spray painted on pedestrian crossing, 31st August

item.title: Repeat fouling of road in front of our house, 31st August
item.description:
We repeatedly have someone defecating in front of our house. There are currently 3 examples there. This may be human or dog. It's disgusting.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London
